#summary System requirements for FDO Toolbox

FDO Toolbox requires the following components be already installed:
  * Microsoft .net Framework 2.0 (http://www.microsoft.com/downloads/details.aspx?FamilyID=0856EACB-4362-4B0D-8EDD-AAB15C5E04F5&displaylang=en)
  * Microsoft Visual C++ 2005 SP1 Runtime Library (http://www.microsoft.com/downloads/details.aspx?FamilyID=200b2fd9-ae1a-4a14-984d-389c36f85647&displaylang=en)
